title: Suggest a jungler!
body:
I want a jungler that has
-high mobility
-good dueling
-good ganks

Thanks!

replies.body:
I'd probably recommend:
{{champion:120}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:104}}
I really wanna get Jarvan, but he seems kind of dead/non viable at the moment, even with the buff. I've also never really thought of him as a good duelist ?

Jarvan's decent at the moment.  He isn't FotM or anything, but he's strong and reliable.

He isn't the best duelist, but he's a decent one.  However, he has a good amount of utility and strong ganks/initiation.

shaco
Nidalee
Kindred (though slightly different gank paths to the normal jungles)
VI
Lee Sin
Graves
Gragas
Zac (seriously do NOT overlook this guy)

so most....lol
Don't pick Nidalee or Kindred, high situational pick, you need a "normal purpose jungler"
Elaborate as to why? (More for kindred than nidalee )

KIndred isn't meta and to be good, you need a enemy team with a lot frontline.
Good teammates, rather difficult when you are with kids ... ^^' (mark / invade or another difficult situation)

Kindred really weak in early game, so any fast aggression going to be a headache (no sustain and you lost a lot stats (armor))
Actually i skip the buff when a Shaco / Lee / Elise or another good early champ is in the game.

I play Kindred exclusively when i'm premade.
{{champion:203}}
not a good jungler actually
Still very strong, you just need to be good at her.
Like every champion in the game

> [{quoted}](name=Darkslayer85,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nf5MrU9w,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T15:10:43.052+0000)
>
> Still **very** strong, you just need to be good at her.
You need to be twice as good than the enemy jungler..
Not at all.
Just play Lee Sin. Riot doesn't want you playing anything else, apparently.

{{champion:3}} 

E for all of your speed needs

W wins any 1v1 for you. (go ahead, blow your whole kit while i have +120 resistance and get healed for your first 5 hits) saw a full build jhin with his crit ready and a {{item:3094}} , shot me with my shield up. I healed off it. 

R, literal best engage ever, cant go wrong. 

only reason he isn't seen is because of his below average clear speeds, but hey, hes got what you're lookin for!
Small movement speed isn't mobility.

an extra 50% isn't good? + damage, i repeat PLUS DAMAGE?!?!

its also for your team mate!!! jeeezzz

what more does a jungler have to do for you

30/35/40/45/50%,and only in a single path,making it easier for enemies to predict your movement and throw shit at you.
Also the ganks are almost non existant until lv 6,and even then you need to walk up to them to ult
Just pick Hecarim,top tier champion with immense mobility and zero brain requirement.
{{champion:77}}
{{champion:245}}

{{champion:120}} ,{{champion:254}} ,{{champion:64}} ...those are good choices for mobility,{{champion:5}} ,{{champion:59}}  really good at dueling,{{champion:48}}  if you just want to be a brute and punish the other team
{{champion:35}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:254}}
I mean I main {{champion:121}}  and you just described him with what you wanted.
